DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the new Boussignac-system of non-invasive ventilation is as good as the conventional non-invasive System in patients presenting with acute hypercapnic respiratory failure.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Trial of the Bilevel Positive Airway Pressure (by Boussignac) in Emergency Department of Non-invasive Patients Presenting With Acute Hypercapnic Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: 7,25 ≤ pH ≤ 7,35 PaCO2 ≥ 45 mmHg pH < 7,24 incapable of collaboration
